thread.title: Eyecatchers | www.ajc.com

author: Nedra Rhone
title: Eyecatchers | www.ajc.com
text:
PORE PERFECT
Le Mieux Cosmetics has introduced a new Skin Perfecter which combines four treatments in one to exfoliate, extract, deep clean and smooth skin. Move the spatula-shaped tool over skin to produce ultrasonic waves that create a mist of micro particles to clean pores of oil, impurities, blackheads and whiteheads. Unlike rotating brush cleaners, it does not need a replacement brush. It has four levels of intensity to suit all skin types and has a rechargeable battery that lasts for two hours. As you gently glide it over skin, you can visibly see dirt and debris releasing from your skin. Once you have cleansed the skin, flip the device over and use the flat edge to help water-based skin products penetrate better. The Skin Perfecter costs $225 and is available at skinperfecter.com or QVC (where it is was recently priced at $189.)
